title: Laughing in prayer breaks the prayer but does it also break Wudu? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: number six laughter so people think that loud laughter whether during prayer or outside of prayer but during prayer it might be a little bit more closer to logic because they say if I'm in prayer and I laugh loud ly this breaks my prayer true true but does it impact my Woodill most of the laymen say yes it does but there's no evidence backing it up so it does not
